unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, swears by Ayurveda. Last Onam, she couldn't travel the 200 km to our ancestral home due to knee pain. After a month of treatments at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala, she was practically dancing! Said it was better than any Rs. 5000 painkiller. Now, she's back to making the best biryani ever! Definitely worth exploring for overall wellbeing, as they say in Kerala.
